Class PageWithAnnotationsNode

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.mobius.vdrapi.IHasConnectionState, IHavePageNotes, INode, IPageFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReportPageNode, SearchTopicItemNode
public abstract class PageWithAnnotationsNode
extends PageFactoryNode
implements IHavePageNotes

A PageWithAnnotationsNode class extends the PageFactoryNode to provide support for PageNotes.

Method Detail

addPageNote

public IPageNote addPageNote(String pageNoteText)
                      throws ViewDirectException
Adds a new PageNote to the page. The page must be locked before this method is called. The returned reference can be used as an argument to the modifyPageNote and deletePageNote methods. Once the page lock is released this reference is no longer valid.

Specified by:
addPageNote in interface IHavePageNotes
Parameters:
pageNoteText - Text of new PageNote.
Returns:
A reference to the new PageNote.
Throws:
PageNotLockedException - if the page is not locked.
PageLockedException - if the page is locked by another process.
ViewDirectException - if an error occurs while adding the PageNote.
See Also:
modifyPageNote( IPageNote pageNoteIn ), deletePageNote( IPageNote pageNoteIn )

deletePageNote

public void deletePageNote(IPageNote pageNoteIn)
                    throws ViewDirectException
Deletes a PageNote from the page.

Specified by:
deletePageNote in interface IHavePageNotes
Parameters:
pageNoteIn - Reference to the PageNote to delete. This reference must be from a locked page.
Throws:
PageNotLockedException - if the page is not locked.
PageLockedException - if the page is locked by another process.
ViewDirectException - if an error occurs while deleting the PageNote.
See Also:
addPageNote( String pageNoteText ), getPageNotes()

getPageNotes

public IPageNote[] getPageNotes()
                         throws ViewDirectException
Returns an array of references to all the PageNotes on the page. If the page was locked before this method is called, any reference in the array can be used as an argument to the modifyPageNote and deletePageNote methods. Once the page lock is released these referencs are no longer valid.

Specified by:
getPageNotes in interface IHavePageNotes
Returns:
An array of references to all the PageNotes on the page.
Throws:
ViewDirectException - if an error occurs while getting the PageNotes.
See Also:
modifyPageNote( IPageNote pageNoteIn ), deletePageNote( IPageNote pageNoteIn )

hasPageNotes

public boolean hasPageNotes()
                     throws ViewDirectException
Returns true if the page contains one or more PageNotes.

Specified by:
hasPageNotes in interface IHavePageNotes
Throws:
ViewDirectException - if an error occurs.

lockPage

public void lockPage()
              throws ViewDirectException
Locks a page for modifying PageNotes.

Specified by:
lockPage in interface IHavePageNotes
Throws:
ViewDirectException - if an error occurs while getting the page lock.
PageLockedException - if the page is locked by another process.

modifyPageNote

public void modifyPageNote(IPageNote pageNoteIn)
                    throws ViewDirectException
Modifys the text of an existing PageNote.

Specified by:
modifyPageNote in interface IHavePageNotes
Parameters:
pageNoteIn - Reference to the PageNote to modify. This reference must be from a locked page.
Throws:
PageNotLockedException - if the page is not locked.
PageLockedException - if the page is locked by another process.
ViewDirectException - if an error occurs while modifying the PageNote.
See Also:
addPageNote( String pageNoteText ), getPageNotes()

unlockPage

public void unlockPage()
                throws ViewDirectException
Releases a previosly acquired lock on a page.

Specified by:
unlockPage in interface IHavePageNotes
Throws:
ViewDirectException - if an error occurs while releasing the page lock.
